products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: J | WATER BASED PLANT > J1 | HYDRANT SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be grooved with groove coupling. All related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope. 150 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ms(mild steel), grade: heavy, thickness: 5.4mm, standard: indian standard 1239 part -1, fittings: elbows, tees, flanges, reduces clamps, ms support dash fasteners, painting: two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint, joint: grooved with groove coupling, scope: all related civil work, supports etc of vendor's scope

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: J | WATER BASED PLANT > J3 | WATER CURTAIN
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection and testing of  heavy grade(class-C) pipes  of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS-1239 including all fittings viz. tees, elbows, reducers, union,  flanges, rubber gaskets,  GI  nuts  bolts,  washer and structural steels for pipe supports. Hanger support with anchor fasteners and clamps shall be supplied to fix the pipes on ceiling wall etc. including supporting/fixing the pipe on floor / wall /ceiling with clamps,   hangers (using anchor fastners) as per specification. Cutting of floors, walls etc and making it good after erection of pipes shall be of vendor's scope. Necessary painting with 2 coats of primer and 2 coats of synthetic enamel paints to be done and supply of paints shall be with vendor's scope. Size 50 NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: grade: class-C, standard: indian standard 1239, fittings included: tees, elbows, reducers, union, flanges, rubber gaskets, gi(galvanized iron) nuts bolts, washer, structural steels for pipe supports, support: hanger support with anchor fasteners and clamps, installation: supporting/fixing on floor/wall/ceiling, painting: 2 coats of primer and 2 coats of synthetic enamel paints, supply of paints: vendor's scope

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: J | WATER BASED PLANT > J4 | FDA SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of aspiration detector with CMOS imager combined with multiple photodiode for reliable very early warning in a wide range of environments with minimal nuisance alarms. The detector should have 4 pipe inlet and min 100m pipelength support per inlet.The detector should have Smart on-board filter retains dust count and remaining filter life for predictable maintenance& coverage area of min 5000 Sq.
products_entries.size: pipe inlet: 4, pipelength support per inlet: min 100m, coverage area: min 5000 Sq.
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: imager: CMOS(complementary metal–oxide–semiconductor), sensor: multiple photodiode, feature: very early warning, feature: minimal nuisance alarms, feature: smart on-board filter retains dust count and remaining filter life for predictable maintenance
